divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS TRAVELLING SOUTHBOUND ON HWY 29 GOING SE MAKING SALES CALLS WHEN I SAW ACIRCULAR OBJECT ZOOM BY ME IN THE CORNER OF MY CARS WINDSHIELD. IT WAS A DULLSILVER DISC OVAL-DISTORTED WITH A SMALL, DULL, CIRCULAR YELLOW CENTER IN IT. THE WEATHER WAS EXCELLENT, SUNNY AND THE SUN WAS BEHIND ME SO IT WAS NOT AREFLECTION IN THE WINDSHIELD. IT HAPPENED SO FAST THAT IF I WAS NOT LOOKINGTHAT WAY, I WOULD HAVE NOT SEEN IT DRIVERS SIDE TOP CORNER OF WINDSHIELD. ITLEFT WHAT I CALLED A VIDEO STROBE ACROSS THE HORIZON FOR A SPLIT SECOND ANDTHERE SEEMED TO BE A INTERMITTENT VAPOR TRAIL IN THE SKY. IT SEEMED TO BE A 100FEET UP OR LESS AND MAYBE A 100 AWAY. I PULLED OVER TO GET A BETTER LOOK AND ITWAS LONG GONE. I STOPPED BY MY NEXT CUSTOMER AND THEIR GUARD IN THE GUARD TOWERDID NOT SEE ANYTHING. MY REACTION WAS, WHAT WAS THAT AND DID I SEE WHAT I THINKI SAW MENTIONED THIS TO MY BOSS THE NEXT DAY AND GOT LOTS OF RIDICULE...THATIS WHY I NEVER REPORTED IT. I CANT BELIEVE HOW MANY PEOPLE FIRST LAUGHED ATWORK WHEN I TOLD THEM WHAT HAPPENED. I THINK IT IS SCARY THAT SOMETHING LIKETHIS ROAMS THE SKIES AND THE GOVERNMENT WONT EXPLAIN IT OR DO SOMETHING ABOUTIT. I SAW WHAT I SAW. GEORGE DAVIS
